hero.tagline: Building the Future, One Pixel at a Time

about.text: I'm a passionate developer with a focus on clean, user-friendly interfaces. I love turning ideas into interactive experiences that delight users. When not coding, you'll find me sketching designs or exploring new tech.

experience.description: Led development of scalable web applications, optimizing performance and user engagement.
Crafted responsive interfaces for client projects, focusing on modern design principles.

projects.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive admin panel built with PHP, MySQL, and modern CSS. Features real-time analytics and intuitive navigation.

projects.title: Portfolio Site (This One!)
projects.description: A simple, design-focused showcase using pure PHP and CSS. Emphasizes elegance over complexity.

projects.title: Mobile App Prototype
projects.description: Interactive wireframes for a fitness tracking app, designed with Figma and implemented in HTML/JS.
